meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Part</kanji> of a <kanji>part</kanji>? That's a <vocabulary>portion</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>section</vocabulary> of that part, and even a <vocabulary>part</vocabulary> in itself!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. As long as you know the readings for these kanji, you should be able to read this word just fine.
